name: magicmirror-3rd-party-modules
description: This project provides an overview of all MagicMirror² modules and puts the modules through a few tests.

scripts.start: ntl --autocomplete --size 50 --exclude start lint* prepare test automated
scripts.all: npm run createModuleList && npm run updateGitHubData && npm run getModules && npm run expandModuleList && npm run checkModules
scripts.ownList: node create_own_module_list.js && npm run updateGitHubData && npm run getModules && npm run expandModuleList && npm run checkModules
scripts.lint: eslint . && stylelint **/docs/*.css && markdownlint-cli2 README.md && prettier --check . && cspell .
scripts.lint:fix: eslint . --fix && stylelint **/docs/*.css --fix && markdownlint-cli2 README.md --fix && prettier . --write . && cspell .
scripts.automated: git fetch origin main && git reset --hard origin/main && git pull && npm i && npm run all && python3 scripts/upload.py

descriptions.all: Run all scripts (1 till 5) on all modules. Requires a lot of time and storage space!
descriptions.createModuleList: Script 1: Convert the official module list from the wiki into a json file.
descriptions.updateGitHubData: Script 2: Update the JSON file that collects the GitHub information of the modules.
descriptions.getModules: Script 3: Get all modules with `git cone`. Requires a lot of time and storage space!
descriptions.expandModuleList: Script 4: Extend the module list with information from the package.json. And get an image if one is available and the license is okay.
descriptions.checkModules: Script 5: Perform various checks on the modules.
descriptions.ownList: Test only defined modules. See README.
descriptions.lint: Check this repository for linter and formatting problems.
descriptions.lint:fix: Fix automatically fixable linter or formatting problems of this repository.
